Posts.Content: Please, we found out yesterday that my partner has prostatic carcinoma with metasthases in bones!!! I am extremely worried!!! Please, could U tell me about treatments and painkilling in that stage? He said the carcinoma went through his bowel and it is painfull! He got some morphine but I am thinking about blocakde (celiac or???) What about killing metasthases?? please help!!!
Posts.Title: Need help-URGENT!!!

Posts.Content: Hello, Barry! It is prostatic cancer which has metastased into the bowel (as far as we know now) THANK U ALL FOR THE ANSWERS!! Please, I want to kill the metasthases! Please if anyone knows who might deal with that, msg me!!! THANK U!!!
Posts.Title: Need help-URGENT!!!

Posts.Content: Hello! My partner living in another state just told me to have metastatic prostatic cancer. I am interested URGENTLY to all doctors and institutions who work on developing of the meta stadium treatment, PARTICULARY of destroying meta themselves!!! PLEASE MSG IF U KNOW ANYONE dealing with that topic!!! MANY THANKS IN ADVANCE!!!
